item.title: 俄罗斯导弹袭击迫使乌克兰向欧盟购买天然气
item.description: 据知情人士透露，俄罗斯导弹对乌克兰国有天然气资产的袭击迫使该国从欧盟购买昂贵的替代燃料。【原文：Russian missile attacks on state-owned natural gas assets in Ukraine have forced the country to buy expensive replacement fuel from the European Union, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: AMD 股价暴跌表明人工智能没有银奖
item.description: 在制造用于训练人工智能软件的芯片方面，Advanced Micro Devices 公司被认为是 Nvidia 公司最大的竞争对手。【原文：Regarded as the biggest competitor to Nvidia Corp. in making chips used to train artificial intelligence software, Advanced Micro Devices Inc.’s shares look less like an immediate rival.】

item.title: 武伊契奇认为欧洲央行春季降息更加明朗，降息押注合理
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员鲍里斯-武伊契奇（Boris Vujcic）表示，尽管要等到第二季度开始才能更确定地知道欧洲央行今年是否会降息，但目前市场对欧洲央行今年再降息三次的预期是合理的。【原文：Market expectations for three more European Central Bank interest-rate cuts this year are reasonable right now, even though it will take until the start of the second quarter to know with more certainty if they’ll materialize, according to Governing Council member Boris Vujcic.】

item.title: 美国 1 月份就业报告分析
item.description: 得克萨斯州阿灵顿一家装配厂的员工在生产线上擦拭车门。摄影师：Matthew Busch/Bloomberg【原文：Employees scuff a door on the production line at an assembly plant in Arlington, Texas. Photographer: Matthew Busch/Bloomberg】

item.description:

item.title: 特朗普希望达成协议，伊朗离核武器还有多远？
item.description: 几十年来，伊朗一直因其核野心以及是否正在发展发射原子武器的能力而备受怀疑。【原文：Iran has faced suspicion for decades over its nuclear ambitions and whether it’s developing the capability to fire an atomic weapon.】

item.title: 初创企业 Rapyd 在新政谈判中面临估值大幅削减
item.description:
Stripe的竞争对手正在洽谈一轮融资，其估值将降至35亿美元。【原文：

The Stripe competitor is in talks for a funding round that would slash its valuation to $3.5 billion.

】

item.title: DeepSeek 的启示对投资者比对科技公司首席执行官更可怕
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，伊恩-金（Ian King）撰文指出，投资者似乎更关心 DeepSeek 的人工智能突破所带来的影响，而不是那些可能因变革而被颠覆的美国科技公司的领导者。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ian King writes that investors seem more concerned about the effects of DeepSeek’s AI breakthrough than the leaders of the US tech companies that might be upended by changes.】

item.description:
LNG 公司在总统重新掌权后的首次交易中表现不佳。【原文：

item.title: 债券而非股票成为特朗普经济团队的关键指标
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂（Chris Anstey），波士顿的经济学编辑，今天我们来关注特朗普政府对债券收益率的新关注点。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston, and today we’re looking at the Trump administration’s emerging focus on bond yields. item.title: 贸易战如何威胁粮食流通和价格上涨
item.description: 本周的主要事件是特朗普政府计划下月对墨西哥和加拿大征收关税，以及中美之间新一轮贸易战的开端。【原文：This week has been dominated by the Trump administration’s plan to impose tariffs on Mexico and Canada next month and the opening shots in a fresh trade war between the US and China.】

item.title: 欧洲央行文件称再降息两次可使利率回归中性
item.description: 欧洲中央银行的经济学家表示，中性利率可能介于 1.75% 和 2.25% 之间，这一概念可能有助于确定削减借贷成本的终点。【原文：Economists at the European Central Bank said the neutral rate of interest, a concept that may help determine where cuts in borrowing costs will end, is probably between 1.75% and 2.25%.】

item.title: 美国银行策略师哈特内特认为美国股市的全球主导地位正在消退
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的策略师们预计，美国股市的优异表现将在 2025 年初被终止后继续消退。【原文：Bank of America Corp. strategists expect US stock-market outperformance to continue to fade after a relentless run was halted in the early part of 2025.】

item.title: 摩根大通交易员称疲软的非农就业数据是美股最坏的情况
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.市场情报。【原文：The US payrolls figures due later on Friday need to be just right — not too hot, and not too cold — for US stocks to keep rising, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co. Market Intelligence.】

item.title: 西班牙 HBX 公司 7.48 亿欧元的首次公开募股定价将处于区间的中间位置
item.description: 西班牙旅游技术公司 HBX Group International Plc 首次公开募股的定价预计为 7.48 亿欧元（约合 7.76 亿美元），处于市场定价区间的中点。【原文：Spanish travel technology firm HBX Group International Plc is expected to price a €748 million ($776 million) initial public offering at the midpoint of its marketed range.】

item.title: 交易员在 2025 年对特朗普下的每一个赌注几乎都失败了
item.description: 12 月，在唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫之前，市场已达成共识：做多美元，做空政府债券，看好美国股票而非世界其他地区。【原文：In December, before Donald Trump’s return to the White House, a market consensus was building: Long the dollar, short government bonds, and favor American stocks over the rest of the world.】

item.title: 伊利称咖啡市场供应 "盲目 "助长投机行为
item.description: 意大利烘焙商 Illycaffè SpA 公司董事长 Andrea Illy 认为，咖啡近期令人眼花缭乱的涨势是由于缺乏对未来供应的洞察力和短期投机造成的，导致消费者购买的咖啡价格上涨。【原文：Coffee’s recent dizzying rally has been fueled by a lack of insight on future supply and short-term speculation, resulting in pricier brews for consumers, according to Andrea Illy, chairman of Italian roaster Illycaffè SpA.】

item.title: 私人信贷模仿 CLO 利用保险公司的万亿资金
item.description: 私营信贷业正逐步接近其保持增长所需的数万亿美元保险金额。【原文：The private credit industry is drawing closer to the trillions of dollars in insurance holdings it needs to keep growing.】

item.title: 阿联酋航空在延误中对波音公司的时间表愈发谨慎
item.description: 阿联酋航空围绕波音公司的 777X 打造了自己的未来机队，目前已订购了 205 架飞机。但在这架巨型飞机的商业首秀多次推迟后，阿联酋航空对其时间表也变得更加谨慎。【原文：Emirates has built its future fleet around Boeing Co.’s 777X, with 205 units on order. But after numerous delays to the giant aircraft’s commercial debut, the airline has also become more cautious about its timeline.】

item.title: 债券交易员等待可能证明美联储谨慎态度的非农就业数据
item.description: 在就业数据公布之前，美国国债在窄幅区间内交投，该数据可能会助长对决策者将保持谨慎的押注，利率举措将被搁置数月之久。【原文：US Treasuries traded in a narrow range ahead of jobs data that may fuel bets policymakers will stay cautious, with interest-rate moves on hold for months.】

item.title: 阿联酋计划向法国数据中心投资高达 500 亿欧元
item.description: 据法国官员透露，一家来自阿拉伯联合酋长国的基金计划斥资 300 亿至 500 亿欧元（312 亿至 520 亿美元）在法国新建一个数据中心园区。【原文：A fund from the United Arab Emirates is planning to spend between €30 billion and €50 billion ($31.2 billion and $52 billion) on a new campus for data centers in France, according to French officials.】

item.title: 美国国际开发署（USAID）在肯尼亚的裁员揭示了生命和美国在全球影响力面临的风险
item.description:
冻结援助资金会危及重要的医疗保健计划以及与美国在世界各地的重要盟友的安全合作

。【原文：

Freezing aid funds jeopardizes critical healthcare programs and security cooperation with important US allies around the world

】

item.title: 对冲基金杉树在三十年后返还外部现金
item.description: 据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）看到的一封信称，总部位于纽约的对冲基金 Fir Tree Partners —；以煽动针对陷入困境的公司的激进运动而闻名—；正在将外部资本返还给投资者。【原文：New York-based hedge fund Fir Tree Partners — known for instigating activist campaigns against distressed companies — is returning outside capital to investors, according to a letter seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 通用汽车、福特股价低廉是有原因的，因为风险在增加
item.description: 通用汽车公司和福特汽车公司是 S&P 500 指数中最便宜的股票之一。但华尔街分析师表示，这并不意味着它们有买入的机会，随着这两家百年汽车制造商前景面临的风险越来越大，他们对这两家公司的股票正迅速产生厌恶情绪。【原文：General Motors Co. and Ford Motor Co. are among the cheapest stocks in the S&P 500 Index. But that doesn’t make them buying opportunities, say Wall Street analysts, who are rapidly souring on the century-old carmakers’ shares as risks around their outlooks grow.】

item.title: 劳资谈判危及租赁合同，芬兰航空酝酿削减飞行员职位
item.description: 芬兰航空公司（Finnair Oyj）表示，由于芬兰未解决的工业行动危及到与其合作伙伴的合作协议，该公司可能被迫裁减多达 90 名执行湿租赁合同的飞行员。【原文：Finnair Oyj said it may be forced to cut as many as 90 pilots operating its wet lease contracts after unresolved industrial action in Finland jeopardizes the cooperation agreement with its partner.】

item.title: 被 "实权派 "拥抱后，Tether 启动交易机器
item.description: 价值 1,400 亿美元的稳定币巨头 Tether Holdings Ltd. 的首席执行官保罗-阿多诺（Paolo Ardoino）上周末在圣萨尔瓦多向聚集在一起的加密货币忠实粉丝们发出了胜利的信息。【原文：Paolo Ardoino, the chief executive officer of $140 billion stablecoin giant Tether Holdings Ltd., had a triumphant message for the crypto faithful gathered in San Salvador late last week.】

item.title: 前景乐观，新交所股价创 17 年最高水平
item.description: 由于新加坡交易所的盈利和前景激发了投资者的热情，该交易所股价攀升至 2007 年 12 月以来的最高水平。【原文：Singapore Exchange Ltd. shares climbed to their highest level since December 2007 as the bourse’s earnings and outlook fanned investor enthusiasm.】

item.title: 石油战略》：制裁叠加，俄罗斯面临迫在眉睫的油轮危机
item.description: 彭博社石油策略师朱利安-李（Julian Lee）写道，由于美国的制裁，俄罗斯似乎正处于石油货运问题的风口浪尖。【原文：Russia appears to be on the cusp of a debilitating oil-freight transportation problem because of US sanctions, writes Bloomberg oil strategist Julian Lee.】

item.title: 印度央行行长称外汇政策旨在保持稳定和效率
item.description: 印度央行新任行长在首次就最近几周货币大幅下滑发表评论时表示，印度央行的外汇政策始终保持一贯性，其目标是在不损害市场效率的情况下保持稳定。【原文：Indian central bank’s foreign exchange policy has remained consistent and aims to maintain stability without hurting market efficiency, its new chief said, in his first comments on the currency which has seen a sharp slide in recent weeks.】

item.title: 国泰君安称欧洲终于迎来债券年
item.description: 国泰君安全球顾问公司（State Street Global Advisors）的策略师认为，欧洲债券今年的表现有望跑赢大盘，因为美国将继续实施贸易关税威胁，迫使央行降低利率。【原文：European bonds are primed to outperform this year because the US will follow through with threatened trade tariffs, forcing the central bank to slash interest rates, according to State Street Global Advisors strategists.】
